title: What Role Is Crypto Actually Playing in the Israel-Palestine Conflict?
description: Industry experts are pushing back after a letter signed by over 100 American lawmakers framed crypto as a key instigator of the current crisis in the Middle East.

title: Meta Has an AI That Can Read Your Mind and Draw Your Thoughts
